property.name: bigtable
property.value: insert into pro_bigtable values(?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE adduserCount = ?,visitCount = ?,userCount = ?,addmemberCount = ?,activeCount = ?,memberCount = ?,sessionnumberCount = ?,sessionlengthCount = ?,averagesessionlength = ?

property.name: bigtablebrowser
property.value: insert into pro_bigtablebrowser values(?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE adduserCount = ?,visitCount = ?,userCount = ?,addmemberCount = ?,activeCount = ?,memberCount = ?,sessionnumberCount = ?,sessionlengthdvalue = ?,sessionlengthCount = ?,averagesessionLength = ?,browserPv = ?

property.name: region
property.value: insert into pro_region values(?,?,?,?,?,?) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE regioncount = ?, sessionnumber = ?,sessionjumpnumber = ?, jumprate = ?

property.name: sessionregion
property.value: insert into pro_sessionregion values(?,?,?) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE count = ?

property.name: sessionjumpnumber
property.value: insert into pro_sessionjumpnumber values(?,?,?) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE count = ?
